title: T206 catchers with American Beauty Backs
author: Vintagecatcher

posts.post_title: T206 catchers with American Beauty Backs
posts.post_content:
Looking to put together a run of T206 catcher cards with AB backs.

Currently have:

Bresnahan (Batting)
Chief Meyers (Portrait)
Gabby Street (Portrait)
Gabby Street (Catching)
Ira Thomas (Throwing)

Would like to purchase nice examples without paper loss or creases/wrinkles.

Please send scans and pricing to:

[url]vintagecatcher@myfairpoint.net[/url]

Thanks,

Patrick
